Key Match Events: Bethancourt drove in seven runs, including a go-ahead two-run single in the ninth
Bellinger singled to right, Happ scored
Crow-Armstrong singled to center, Hoerner scored on error, Crow-Armstrong to third
Bethancourt homered to center, Crow-Armstrong scored
Bethancourt doubled to left, Crow-Armstrong scored and Swanson scored
Happ singled to center, Bethancourt scored
Swanson grounded into fielder's choice to second, Bellinger scored, Hoerner out at second, Vázquez to third
Bethancourt singled to left, Swanson scored and Vázquez scored, Crow-Armstrong to second
Happ singled to center, Crow-Armstrong scored, Bethancourt to third
